Original:
加班後的夜晚獨自來到這間溫暖的小店✨

整體的氣氛，不管是裝潢、燈光、音樂都非常的舒服，適合下班後想輕鬆享受個人時光，或是好友之間互相閒聊的人過來😚

杏鮑菇的滷汁香氣飽滿且濃厚，真的超級好吃，豆干也非常入味～個人覺得這兩樣必點！！！

店家推薦的精釀啤酒真的很讚👍
這次喝的「七里香」果香豐富，很難想像沒有任何添加物就能釀出這麼豐富的味道，讓平常不太喝啤酒的我大開眼見！

之後有機會再來試試其他的啤酒，謝謝老闆親切的介紹帶給我這麼美好的一段時光。
EN:
After overtime night, I came to this warm shop alone ✨

The overall atmosphere is very comfortable whether it is decoration, lighting, or music. It is suitable for people who want to enjoy personal time after get off work, or people who chat with each other.

Pleurotus eryngii's marinade is full and strong. It is really delicious, and the dried tofu is also very delicious ~ I personally think these two must be ordered!IntersectionIntersection

The craft beer recommended by the store is really good
The "Qili fragrance" this time is rich in fruity. It is difficult to imagine that without any additives can make such a rich taste, so that I usually don't drink beer, I will see it!

After that, I have the opportunity to try other beer again. Thank you for your kind introduction for bringing me such a beautiful time.

愛吃辣的絕對要添加鎮店辣油！！
EN:
Very delicious private room, the boss's selected white wine Chardonnay's entrance is charming flower fruit fragrance, consumption is affordable, but there is a star hotel level, good music, spending a wonderful night, it is worthy of everyone to taste.

Those who love spicy food will definitely add spicy oil in the town shop!Intersection
